name: SWYF – See What You Fit
description: An AI-powered fashion try-on platform using AR and blockchain, reducing returns and enhancing customer satisfaction with real-time virtual fitting and token-based rewards.

name: Magic Clipboard
description: A real-time clipboard sharing tool built with WebSockets and Firebase for seamless multi-device copy-paste functionality.

name: Aid - Smart Email Manager
description: An AI-powered email assistant that categorizes mails, generates summaries, smart replies, manages tasks and enhances productivity with integrated calendar and security.

name: Sorry Counter
description: A playful web app tracking the number of times 'sorry' is said, storing entries securely and displaying data with fun visuals.
